item.title: Angular NgRx Starter Guide
item.description: The Redux JavaScript library was made famous by React and Elm, but its design patterns can also be applied in Angular. The general idea is that all application data is kept in a single JavaScript object on the client, giving you a predictable tree of state changes (we’ll get into this later). In this lesson, we are going to build a simple NgRx Angular app from scratch, that will eventually become this NgRx-Fire demo app.
